dt-option.name: buttons.dom.button.tag
dt-option.summary: Set the HTML tag to use for the elements used to create individual button

type.description: The HTML tag to use. There should be no spaces or any other formatting - e.g. it should simply be `span`, `div`, `input`, `a` etc.

dt-option.description: This option controls the HTML tag that is used to create each individual button. Please refer to the `b-init buttons.dom` documentation for an overview of the DOM structure that Buttons will create. In this specific case, this option controls the `...` that is shown in the example HTML there.

example.title: DataTables initialisation: Use an `input` tag for buttons
Instance initialisation: Use a `div` tag for buttons
